price: Na ngawira nyingi watakazo zichukua. Na Mwenyezi Mungu ni Mwenye nguvu, Mwenye hikima.
arabic: وَمَغَانِمَ كَثِيرَةٗ يَأۡخُذُونَهَاۗ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَزِيزًا حَكِيمٗا

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wamaghānima kathīratan yakhudhūnahā wakāna al-lahu ʿazīzan ḥakīman
